name: Air Funnel
description: Technique to create a cannon\nfor small projectiles.

name: Air Scooter
description: A form of transportation\ninvented by Aang.

name: Airbender Staff
description: A wooden stave used primarily\nby airbenders to augment their \nbending.

name: Airbender Upgraded Staff
description: Upgraded staff made by\nMechanist for Aang at the Fire\nNation Invasion.

name: Asphyxiation
description:
Manipulates the flow of air
within a person's respiratory
system and prevents any new
intake of breath by forming a
ball of air around the head.

name: Glider
description: Aerial transportation made by Mechanist,\ninspired from Air nomad gliders.

name: Hot Air Balloon
description: Air balloon created by\nMechanist, originally developed\nfor the Fire Nation

name: Crystal Armor
description: Armor made of crystal that\nmakes the person cannot\nmove.

name: Earth Sink
description: Make the person sink to the\nground.

name: Lavabending
description: Manipulate molten earth.

name: Metalbending
description: Ability to bend metal.

name: Rock Gloves
description: Favored weapons of Ba Sing Se's\nsecret police force, known as the\nDai Li.

name: Slinky Tank
description:
Stone vehicles provided both
transportation and protection
during the invasion of the Fire
Nation.

name: Surface Rocks
description: Largse rocks used as projectiles\nof Royal Earthbender Guards.

name: Blue Fire
description: Bend completely blue flames,\nwhich are hotter than the orange\nflames.

name: Combustionbending
description: Ignite objects with their\nmind instead of traditional\nfirebending methods.

name: Fire Armor
description: Fire Nation armor.

name: Lightningbending
description: Manipulate lightning by separating\nthe yin and yang energies.

name: Shozin Comet
description:
Formerly known as the Great
Comet. A celestial object that
passes close to the Earth every
one hundred years, just
skimming the surface of the
upper atmosphere.

name: Trebuchets
description: Large weapons to conduct\nlong-range artilery warfare.

name: Wall of Flames
description: Wall of concentrated flames acts\nas a barrier to incoming attacks.

name: Bloodbending
description: Ability that allows \nwaterbender to manipulate \nperson's movement.

name: Club
description: A blunt force weapon used for \nstriking. Mostly used by Sokka.

name: Full Moon
description: Enhance the ability of \nwater bending.

name: Ice Claws
description: Drawing water around the \nfingers and freezing it.

name: Ice Prison
description: This technique covers an \nopponent in a prison made \nof ice.

name: Tangle Mine
description:
Military weapons invented by 
Hakoda to aid the Southern 
Water Tribe's quest to defeat 
the Fire Nation.

name: Wolf Armor
description: Protective battle gear worn by \nthe warriors of the Southern \nWater Tribe.

name: Astral Projection
description: Despite not having been bound by a corporeal form, the projection was able to both inflict and sustain great physical damage.

name: Spirit Energy Manipulation
description: The ability to manipulate energy originating from the Spirit World.
